snippet: The controversy surrounding Iran’s nomination of the ambassador to the U.N. should not divert Tehran and Washington from securing a final nuclear deal.
abstract: Editorial submits many obstacles remain before achieving nuclear program deal with Iran and removing threat of country's producing a nuclear weapon; cites resistance and unreasonable demands by hard-line forces on both sides; also cites controversy around Iran's nomination of Hamid Aboutalebi as ambassador to United States; says both sides should push hard to achieve deal since consequences for failure are enormous.
lead_paragraph: The controversy surrounding Iran’s nomination of the ambassador to the U.N. should not divert Tehran and Washington from securing a final nuclear deal.
